price: (Hadir) kaa sε: “Manka ankyerε wo sε wontumi nya me ho aboterε?”
arabic: قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُلۡ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
